Generative AI & Large Language Models Glossary

A document gathering terms and definitions related to Generative AI and Large Language Models, including foundation models, GPT variants, pre-trained models, and embedding vectors.

Key Concepts:

  • A foundation model is a large artificial intelligence model trained on unlabeled data
  • A pre-trained model or component that has been already trained
  • Embedding vector
  • retrieval augmented generation
  • language models
  • dialogue applications
Generative AI Large Language Models Foundation models GPT Transformer-based models vector database search engine embeddings store
